thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 3 of 108
thread.title: Alicia

author: Alicia
title: Alicia
text:
I haven't had any problems yet on getting paid. I really like that they have bonus options on payout. That's awesome.
I had one order that wasn't tracked properly and that was taken care of once I opened a claim. This was a few months ago.
I've now had two payouts and I have a couple of things pending. Pretty great I think. Their cashback is often higher than others and that payout bonus helps even more. i will continue to use them.
